* Zyber narrowed her optics a bit as she hards DeathScyth laugh evily, 
wondering about just how bots could get so currupted that all they could 
think about was death and destruction. No wonder there was a war going on, 
with being like this one terrorizing the planet.

But even as DeathScythe advenced on her she backed further into the cave, 
momenterraly tripping on a small rock but regaining her balence and 
continuing on into the shadows.
Her mind kept wreeling. Why was he like this, even after she had saved his 
life? Didn't that count for anything?!
But she kept calm, other then backing up and hearing her spark pound in her 
ears.*

" It has kept me alive so far, has it not?"

* But she knew that talking to this bot was useless, just like it was to 
think that he could have at least let her go as thanx for saving his 
miserable life.
However, as her form bacxked even further into the cave her foot slipped in 
a small puddle, DeathScythe shoting 2 charges at her at the same time.
So, she not only fell back, but flew a few feet further into the cave as 
well. Hitting the far wall hard and with a sickening crack.

Zyber whimpered silently as she slowly rise from a sprawl to a sit, looking 
down at her chest and shoulder to see mech-fluid leaking from them.
But she slowly stood, her optics fixed on DeathScythe but also inching along 
the wall to get towards the passage which led deeper into the caverns.*

" It is not skills which make beings strong, it is their willingness and 
pure of spark which gives them their strength.
The weak are only those which chose to hide their purity until a certain 
time in their life where they can release it and rise above the reast. As it 
always has been and still is."
